item.title: Procedural Death Jam, 7 Day Rogue Like, Cyberpunk Game jamathon.
item.description: Ok. Itâ€™s official as of 16.04 (CET) I have entered in all of the above mentioned GameJams. This is where I will track my development. The project can be found at: https://github.com/fritzvd/abime It. Is. On! Update: Note to self: Neko target in Haxe does not handle placement of BitmapData well. Been spending an hour to get it to work. Other target was instant. <strong Update 2: This was a very bad week to be working on something like this.
